snippet: The Solomon R. Guggenheim Museum is planning the construction of a new building somewhere in New York City that will be used for offices, art storage and some public programming.
abstract: The Solomon R. Guggenheim Museum is planning the construction of a new building somewhere in New York City that will be used for offices, art storage and some public programming.

headline.main: Guggenheim Plans New Building in New York City
headline.print_headline: A New Guggenheim Building For Offices and Art Storage
